metadata.title: CVE-2015-3250 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Apache Directory LDAP API before 1.0.0-M31 allows attackers to conducttiming attacks via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3250` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache-directory-api-java - 1.0.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apache-directory-api package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.0-1').
